name: elemental-alchemy-game
description: An interactive elemental alchemy game built with React

scripts.kill-server: powershell "$port = netstat -ano | Select-String ':3001.*LISTENING'; if($port) { $processId = ($port -split '\s+')[-1]; Stop-Process -Id $processId -Force; Write-Host 'Killed process on port 3001' } else { Write-Host 'No process found on port 3001' }"
